contentList.content: Lend me your prayers, kin. I will pour every drop of my magic into this tree if the Earthmother wills it so.
I will spend every drop of my magic to save this tree from death, if Chauntea wills it.
Behold, vayemniri. The tree is plagued by pestilence, yet will not die - I believe Chauntea wishes me to save it.
Behold - this tree is plagued by pestilence, yet refuses to die. The goddess Chauntea wishes me to save it - I can feel it.
